alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland; Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 4:58PM CDT until April 02 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erath County in north central Texas... Northeastern Eastland County in north central Texas... North central Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gorman, or 13 miles south of Ranger, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Dublin, Gorman, Huckabay, Bluff Dale, Morgan Mill, Lake Leon, Staff, Kokomo, Harbin, Alexander, Clairette, Lingleville, Duffau, Bunyan, Rucker, Johnsville, Selden, Hannibal and Chalk Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
